data.body: Current RLM uses depth 1 (one sub-LLM). Test depth 2: a sub-LLM summarizing a previous sub-LLM's output. Does accuracy collapse linearly or exponentially? Build a depth-N variant of RLMStrategy that chains delegation. Run on all scenarios at depth 1, 2, 3. This costs pennies and nobody has published depth-scaling curves for RLM.
